bibl.title: Justinian and His Two Codes. Revisiting P. Oxy. 1814.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The two editions of the Code. - 3. The first edition inferred from the second. - 4. The first edition reflected in literary sources. - 5. P. Oxy. XV, 1814 [= M.-P.3 2969; LDAB 6324]. General comments. - 6. The papyrus as evidence for relocation of material between editions. - 7. The papyrus as evidence for additions and excisions. - 8. CJ. book 1 title 11 in the two editions. - 9. Concluding remarks. - Pp. 108-111: Appendix: Syntagma of CJ. first and second editions.
bibl.seg: CORCORAN Simon, Justinian and His Two Codes. Revisiting P. Oxy. 1814.

1. Introduction. - 2. The two editions of the Code. - 3. The first edition inferred from the second. - 4. The first edition reflected in literary sources. - 5. P. Oxy. XV, 1814 [= M.-P.3 2969; LDAB 6324]. General comments. - 6. The papyrus as evidence for relocation of material between editions. - 7. The papyrus as evidence for additions and excisions. - 8. CJ. book 1 title 11 in the two editions. - 9. Concluding remarks. - Pp. 108-111: Appendix: Syntagma of CJ. first and second editions.
